citation.article-title: Tuberibacillus calidus gen. nov., sp. nov., isolated from a compost pile and reclassification of Bacillus naganoensis Tomimura et al. 1990 as Pullulanibacillus naganoensis gen. nov., comb. nov. and Bacillus laevolacticus Andersch et al. 1994 as Sporolactobacillus laevolacticus comb. nov.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Pullulanibacillus naganoensis comb. nov.
Pullulanibacillus naganoensis (na.ga.no.enâ€²sis. N.L. gen. n. naganoensis of Nagano, a Japanese Prefecture).
Basonym: Bacillus naganoensis Tomimura et al. 1990.
The description is the same as that given by Tomimura et al., 1990.
Additional characteristics found in this study are given above in the genus description.
